channel.title: Microsoft Lync Server 2013 on Zachary Loeber's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Lync Server 2013 on Zachary Loeber's Site

item.title: Lync: Voice Route Diagram Creation Script
item.description: Lync voice routing boils down to three basic components working in concert to decide call flow. It seems quite simple on paper, you assign voice policies which determine call routes based on PSTN usages (often called the ‘glue’). After looking at Lync voice routing way too many times I finally caved into producing a script to create diagrams of the things over the Thanksgiving holiday weekend.
